message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. After careful consideration, I would like to propose an offer of $8200 for the item.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $10000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $8500 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $9800.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to counter with an offer of $9000 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $9500.
Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to counter with an offer of $9200 for the product.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $9700.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to counter with an offer of $9500 for the product.
